title: Blog plugin(news scroller) works not sufficiently in the version firefox 128.3.1-esr
content:
Hello, I have a problem with a news scrolling feature of blog after upgrading to the version firefox 128.3.1-esr. Before upgradeing, the wordpress blog's plugin, namely 'Vertical News Scroller' pulled up the news' titles by unite 5 in the side bar of the right top. That means news titles including links and short comments move upward slowly in the case of access to the blog, and visitors can see those titles, comments, and move to the real article through the link.

But now the plugin works not good. 2 or 3 titles moves upward, and then returns abruptly to the first news title, and that behaviour repeats again and agian. I have a doubt about any kinds of bugs in the version 128.3.1-esr or the above version, because in other browsers, for example konqueror (linux browser), the plugin works with no problem like earlier, that is to say, the news titles move up by unite 5.

I suppose that the plugin's actions work right in another browser(ms explorer, chrome etc). In the case of using other desktop I have no problem with that too.

So I want to know why this error happens. Does have the latest version of firefox(desktop) have bugs related to this plugin-failure?
creator: cordiale

title: gitkraken/dev
content: The DuxCoin Cloud Ledger is a decentralized cloud patch that securely tracks and verifies all transactions and ownership records for DuxCoin across the Thydux network. This patch leverages cloud infrastructure to ensure high availability, scalability, and redundancy, while maintaining the integrity of the blockchain. Users can interact with the ledger via APIs or smart contracts, enabling seamless integration with decentralized applications (dApps) built within the Thydux ecosystem.

creator: Dan2023

title: When I opened firefox it acted like a new install. Custom ettings and extension storage are gone.
content:
It's a bit weird, I got the thing you get when you migrate to a new browser - asking if you'd like to migrate history and bookmarks. I closed it because I've used firefox for years.

When firefox opened proper, I got a tab asking to restore the previous session, along with a "Welcome to firefox" tab. As well I got a few popups for other things, basically just stuff you see when you open firefox for the first time. A couple of extensions opened up a landing page that should only open when you first install them.

All my bookmarks and browser history is there. The settings have all been reset to default. The extensions are there but all of their storage seems to be gone, like my dark reader extension no longer has the exception sites on it. Ublock has the ad count reset and most importantly all my custom rules are gone! I have spent years making hundreds of custom rules, and quite a few took hours to get right. I am sad about losing that.

Does anyone know what might have happened?

When I was looking at my about:config to see I saw these things in the modified settings.

there's quite a few settings here and IDK which are relevant. The ones in the pictures where just the first couple and I show them because they seem to have something to do with this situation "auto migrated" - when it seems like the browser did this because it thinks it migrated, the first screen I got was asking if I'd like to transfer my bookmarks and history (and good thing I closed it,or it might have deleted those too).
creator: noneuclideanmotion

title: Alt + 7/4 changes back to main page, how can i disable it?
content: I was writing something in an online text editor. I use the symbol "«" frequently in my texts, and i never had an issue with writing the code to set it, which is Alt + 174. However, all of a sudden using Alt + 7 brings me back to the home page trough the link "About:home" and Alt + 4 Does something similar, but back to the page i was before. Is there a way to disable this? I didn't change anything in my settings, and this situation has made writing symbols that use Alt + [Number] incredibly annoying as i have to look for them in the internet and copy and paste them.
creator: 1v4nch3t0

title: Youtube videó feltöltési probléma
content: Üdvözlet! Az a problémám, hogy mikor a Youtube-ra videót szeretnék feltölteni, a bejövő ablakban 0 %-on megáll a feltöltés és nem megy tovább. Ezt nagyjából egy hete vettem észre. Az is igaz, hogy én szeptember 28-án raktam fel videót ezt megelőzően utoljára, akkor még minden rendben volt. Opera alatt működik rendesen és telefonról is fel tudok tölteni. Ahogy olvastam ez a probléma már hetek óta fennáll világszerte. Említették a bővítményeket, blokkolókat, de nekem olyan nincs fenn, mert megnéztem. Win.10 64 bites a rendszerem. A Firefox frissítéseket megnéztem: szeptember 18.: 130.0.1. - Ez még működött! október. 2. : 131.0. - Ezt nem tudom megmondani, de lehet már hibás volt. október 9. : 131.0.2. - Ennél fennállt a hiba, mert október 13-án már nem tudtam videót feltölteni! október 15. : 131.0.3. - Szintén nem működik a feltöltés! Köszönöm a segítséget előre is! Mellékelem a fotókat is!
creator: bareszsopte

title: https-only exception not working?
content:
using Firefox Developer Edition Version 130.0b5 (64-bit)

https-only mode is enabled for all windows enabled, with a couple exceptions. one of those exceptions is www.bom.gov.au , which does not support that mode. anytime someone tries to open a page from there in said mode, leads to a page that redirects to it's homepage, highlighting that it is unsupported, and changing from any specific url to the redirect url.

in the past it worked well to have this page listed under the exceptions for https-only, always loaded without a hitch. but now it's treating the page as not an exception. i've removed it from the exception list and tried loading, re-added and tried loading, but the result is always the same. can anyone please help?

title: How to delete old sync data so that I can upload a new sync?
content:
Hello, I've got a bit of an issue with Sync. So, my current sync profile is outdated by ages, and I'd like to delete it completely and update it with all of the information on my desktop browser. 

But, when I try to enable sync on my desktop it overwrites my desktop profile with all of the outdated information saved on Sync. I can't seem to find anywhere to delete the saved Sync data so that I can upload a new copy.

I hope someone can help, thank you!
creator: amandaazenith
